橫七豎八.definition: in disorder; at sixes and sevens (idiom)

橫三豎四.definition: in disorder; in a tremendous mess

橫刀奪愛.definition: to rob sb of sth they cherish (idiom)

橫切.definition: to cut across; a horizontal cut

橫吹.definition: military wind and percussion music played on horseback under the Han; transverse flute; to play such a flute

橫屍遍野.definition: corpses are strewn across the field (typically after a battle)

橫山.definition: Hengshan, the name of various places; Yokoyama (Japanese surname)

橫山鄉.definition: Hengshan township in Hsinchu County 新竹縣|新竹县[Xin1 zhu2 Xian4], northwest Taiwan

橫峰.definition: Hengfeng county in Shangrao 上饒|上饶, Jiangxi

橫峰縣.definition: Hengfeng county in Shangrao 上饒|上饶, Jiangxi

橫征暴斂.definition: to tax by force and extort levies (idiom); to screw taxes out of the people by force

橫心.definition: to steel oneself; to harden one's heart

橫挑鼻子豎挑眼.pinyin: heng2 tiao1 bi2 zi5 shu4 tiao1 yan3
橫挑鼻子豎挑眼.definition: to pick on sth incessantly (idiom); to criticize right and left

橫掃.definition: to sweep away; to sweep across

橫斑林鶯.definition: (bird species of China) barred warbler (Curruca nisoria)

橫斑腹小鴞.definition: (bird species of China) spotted owlet (Athene brama)

橫斷.definition: to cross (a road, an ocean etc); to cut across

橫斷山脈.definition: Hengduan mountains, several parallel mountain ranges on the border between west Yunnan and Sichuan and east Tibet

橫流.definition: to overflow; transverse flow; to flow over; cross flow

橫濱市.definition: Yokohama, major port city in Kanagawa prefecture 神奈川縣|神奈川县[Shen2 nai4 chuan1 xian4], Japan

橫生.definition: to grow without restraint; overflowing with; to happen unexpectedly

橫眉.definition: to concentrate one's eyebrows; to frown; to scowl

橫眉冷對千夫指.pinyin: heng2 mei2 leng3 dui4 qian1 fu1 zhi3
橫眉冷對千夫指.definition: to face a thousand pointing fingers with a cool scowl (citation from Lu Xun); to treat with disdain; to defy

橫眉怒目.definition: lit. furrowed brows and blazing eyes; to dart looks of hate at sb (idiom)

橫眉立目.definition: to scowl and stare down; to defy

橫眼.definition: from the side of the eye; askance

橫空.definition: filling the atmosphere; covering the sky

橫空出世.definition: (idiom) to come to the fore in spectacular fashion; to emerge from obscurity to achieve great success

橫筆.definition: bristles lying down (brush movement in painting)

橫結腸.definition: transverse colon (anatomy); second section of large intestine

橫行.definition: to go on the rampage; to riot; to run amuck

橫行霸道.definition: to oppress; to rule as a despot; to tyrannize

橫街.definition: side street; road branching from the main street

橫衝直撞.definition: (idiom) to barge through, jostling and elbowing; to charge around; to rampage

橫說豎說.definition: to explain sth over and over again; to repeat

橫財.definition: easy money; windfall; ill-gotten gains; undeserved fortune; illegal profit

橫貫.definition: horizontal traverse; to cut across; to cross transversally

橫越.definition: to cross; to pass over; to traverse; trans-

橫跨.definition: to span; to stretch across; to travel across

橫躺豎臥.definition: to lie down all over the place; exhausted and in disarray

橫鉤.definition: horizontal stroke with a hook at the end (in Chinese characters)

橫陳.definition: to lie in disarray; to cut across; to traverse

橫隊.definition: rank; row; troops (or vehicles etc) lined up side by side

橫須賀.definition: Yokosuka (port and navy base in the Tokyo bay)

橫須賀市.definition: Yokosuka city and US naval base to the west of Yokohama, Japan

橫頭橫腦.definition: coarse and arrogant; always in the right

橫飛.definition: (of spittle, blood, bullets etc) to fly through the air
